content.html: Why is it so hard for men to just agree to let us choose the solution that is safest for the situation we are in? My abuser can't spoof my wireless number. He can take my devices. It's that simple.
content.value:
Why is it so hard for men to just agree to let us choose the solution that is safest for the situation we are in?

My abuser can't spoof my wireless number. He can take my devices.

It's that simple.
